desc: Heroki Kidney Shield is both comfortable and stylish. It adjusts to your body’s every movement, yet upon impact, forms a comfortable shield that protects your precious new kidney. This one-piece belt combines shock-absorbing non-newtonian material with high- quality dry-fit and ergonomic back support.

layout.text: The Kidney Shield is super comfy and adjusts to your body's every movement, yet upon impact, it forms a protective shield that keeps your new kidney safe.
